about_the_game:
MEOWDAY, MEOWDAY! REMOTE OPERATORS, WE NEED YOU!

Citadrill is recruiting ambitious self-starters to become remote operators! Tired of your office job? Then come shepherd a moving base in an exciting and dynamic workplace called the ✨abyss✨. Drill for resources, build weapons, and decide how to allocate materials. Every decision will count as you manage your cat-izens, explore hazardous environments, and fight off monsters. Don't fret if one expedition ends in disaster— you can always start a new run! 

No previous experience required! We will offer on-the-job training. Sound great? Read on to find out if you're our next rockstar remote operator. 

BUILD IN A FAST-PACED ENVIRONMENT

You'll be in charge of building what your workers need and acquiring what's necessary for the drill's survival. Plop buildings down in your moving settlement, assign workers to stations, and create a flourishing, efficient Citadrill with lots of happy workers… and fancy weapons.

EXPLORE AND WEAR LOTS OF HATS 

In order to build and keep your cat-izens thriving, you'll embark on missions into the eerie abyss. Brave the unknown for resources while keeping your drill intact and crew alive. Different environments will also require different adaptations and tactics. The abyss is also a wonderfully diverse ecosystem! Encounter everything from eccentric – but somehow wildly successful – shop keepers, to giant ice ‘shrimps’ with a taste for stray drills.

SURVIVE… AND TRAUMA BOND–ER, WE MEAN, BECOME FAMILY… WITH CAT COWORKERS!

Many underground monsters are…unfriendly, to put it lightly. But! We believe the right remote operator can tackle the challenge of going toe-to-toe with colossal citapedes, refusing to back down when faced with difficult enemies or hazardous environments. And you won't be alone! C.A.T. is a dependable Drill O.S. who will accompany you through any number of horrors daily tasks and trials.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution and dedicated graphics card with 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Captain a giant drill in this basebuilder roguelite with a combination of action and strategy! Build, explore, and survive in a world inspired by 1-bit aesthetics. Who will win: the abyss and its fearsome tests, or your mettle and paw-some cat crew?
